content.text:
## Analysis of the Main Target Image

The main target image shows a structure composed of building blocks in different colors (red, orange, yellow) and shapes. There are two distinct structures:

1. A taller tower-like structure on the right:
   - Base: Three orange cylindrical pillars
   - Middle: A yellow rectangular block supporting a red arch structure
   - Top: Another orange cylindrical pillar with an orange triangular roof

2. A smaller house-like structure on the left:
   - Red archway base
   - Orange sloping roof sections

### Block Count and Layers
- Total blocks used: 11 blocks
- The tower structure has 4 distinct layers
- The separate house structure has 2 layers

### Spatial Relationships
- Tower structure: Three vertical orange cylinders form the base, with a yellow horizontal beam across them supporting a red archway structure with a yellow half-cylinder, topped by another orange cylinder and an orange triangular roof.
- House structure: A red archway base with orange roof pieces arranged in a sloping pattern.

## Selected Blocks from Dictionary

Based on the target image, I need the following blocks:

1. Tower Structure:
   - Three orange cylindrical pillars (Block #9)
   - One yellow horizontal beam (Block #6)
   - One red archway structure (Block #2)
   - One yellow half-cylinder piece (Block #11)
   - One more orange cylindrical pillar (Block #9)
   - One orange triangular roof piece (Block #15)

2. Separate House Structure:
   - One red archway base (Block #2)
   - Three orange triangular roof pieces (Block #16)

## Block Indices List
- Block #2 (used twice)
- Block #6 (used once)
- Block #9 (used four times)
- Block #11 (used once)
- Block #15 (used once)
- Block #16 (used three times)

## Assembly Order

```
{
   Step1: Move block with index 9
   Step2: Move block with index 9
   Step3: Move block with index 9
   Step4: Move block with index 6
   Step5: Move block with index 2
   Step6: Move block with index 11
   Step7: Move block with index 9
   Step8: Move block with index 15
   Step9: Move block with index 2
   Step10: Move block with index 16
   Step11: Move block with index 16
   Step12: Move block with index 16
}
```

This assembly order first builds the tower structure from bottom to top, then creates the separate house structure.
